numerators.definition: TB cases (all forms) that have been notified.
numerators.name: TB cases (all forms) notified

numerators.definition: TB cases registered (for treatment), e.g. as reported in treatment outcome reporting forms.
numerators.name: TB cases registered for treatment

numerators.definition: TB cases successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among TB cases notified to the national health authorities in a specified time period.
numerators.name: TB cases successfully treated

numerators.definition: New and relapse TB patients who had an HIV test recorded in the TB register.
numerators.name: TB cases tested for HIV

numerators.definition: HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients who received ART during TB treatment
numerators.name: HIV-positive TB cases initiating ART

numerators.definition: Bacteriologically-confirmed RR and/or MDR-TB cases enrolled on second-line anti-TB treatment during the year of assessment who are successfully treated (cured plus completed treatment).
numerators.name: MDR-TB cases successfully treated

numerators.definition: Confirmed malaria cases reported.
numerators.name: Confirmed malaria cases

numerators.definition: Confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment.
numerators.name: Confirmed malaria treated

numerators.definition: Malaria cases (presumed and confirmed) that received first line antimalarial treatment.
numerators.name: Malaria cases treated

numerators.definition: Suspected malaria cases that received a parasitological test.
numerators.name: Malaria cases tested
